channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Black bin liners , boxes and general rubbish, 11th September
item.description:
Black bin liners left on the side of the pavement/green area. Not collected by regular dustman. Then the pile is added to by people who dump other stuff. Ongoing problem - these bags have been there over 2 weeks.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sandway Road, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The lorry loaded with waste abandoned with rear nearside wheel on the kerb in front of house no 1 Wroxton Road, SE15 2BN. Needs removing, 11th September
item.description:
Abandoned vehicle - owner, if any, not a local resident. The near side rear wheel is on the kerb and the outer of the two wheels looks punctured. The lorry has been abandoned there with no trace of an owner. Needs removing

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Wroxton Road, Nunhead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No lights working on the estate, 11th September
item.description:
The estate is in complete darkness there is no lights for months and those leaseholders should be refunded via their service charge
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Churchill Walk, Hackney, London

item.title: Dumping empty beer barrels and gas cylinders in the alley way, 11th September
item.description:
Hi we have spoken to the beer garden next door several times about dumping their beer barrels and gas cylinders in the alley way which should be clear at all times for access for all the shops. The gas cylinders are a fire hazard.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Dalston Lane, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bad Flytipping, 11th September
item.description:
Much of this has been here for more than a week, it’s the worst it’s been in a while. Can someone come and pick up all of this trash? Not just a portion of it? It’s impeding the walkways around our house.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southwark Bridge Road, The Borough, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Wilton Way Deli Film Crew using parking bays without license, 11th September
item.description:
2 parking bays are being used by a film crew shooting at the Wilton Way Deli and FRANS cafe without a parking bay suspension license. I also presume the cafe and deli are making a substantial profit from this - what is going to the neighbourhood?

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Navarino Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken and missing road name sign, 11th September
item.description:
This has been reported before but never fixed the sign this end of Gainsborough square is missing and the other end is broken. Can they both be replace please as been like this for well over a year. First reported Jan 24 (broken sign) a couple of months later the other one was taken away but nothing since? Last report is n. 7972236 has been closed without carrying out the required.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hanover Way, Blendon, London
Report on FixMyStreet
